manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: How to Find the Right Frying Pan for Your Kitchen? Avoid nonstick pans with textured cooking surface Some nonstick frying pans come with textured surfaces, such as the Frieling Black Cube Fry Pan and the Circulon Symmetry Hard-Anodized Nonstick French Skillet. It sounds a little like a no-brainer, but we found that the pans with textured surfaces were consistently less nonstick than pans with smooth surfaces — and the experts agree. “A raised pattern on a nonstick pan pretty much negates its nonstick ability,” Braun confirms. “Food tends to grip to the texture, so a smooth-bottomed pan is ideal in this category.” Why would a nonstick frying pan have a textured surface? In the case of the Frieling Black Cube Fry Pan, it might be so that you can use metal utensils on the pan — a fact that Frieling advertises prominently. The Frieling pan was the only one to pass our fork scratch test with no marks whatsoever — so those surfaces are good for something! Pick your ply KOCH SYSTEME CS Nonstick Frying Pan is your best choice!

KOCH SYSTEME CS BRAND STORY WHO WE ARE KOCH SYSTEME CS, since the 1980s, is a kitchenware brand of Carl Schmidt Sohn GmbH, in Solingen, Germany. Building on our expertise, since 1829, in the development of knives and cutlery, KOCH SYSTEME CS has been expanding into further kitchenware product categories with focus on flatware and cookware concepts that perfectly meet the needs of our customers. KOCH SYSTEME CS core product lines are characterized by fexibility and individuality. The brand KOCH SYSTEME CS is available in many different parts of the world and distributed worldwide through our international branch of offices in Los Angeles and in Hong Kong. Due to the international representations as well as the experience and expertise in kitchenware, KOCH SYSTEME CS can meet the needs of its business partners.

EASY TO CLEAN The non-stick coating allows you to clean your CS-KOCH frying pans with water & a cloth after the light cooking. Although the Non-Stick Coating pan in this set is dishwasher safe, hand washing with a mild detergent and warm water is recommended. Using abrasive cleaners can harm your Red cookware pan, so we don’t recommend it SPEEDY & EVENLY HEATING Evenly conducting heats on any stove tops (including induction stoves). CS-KOCH carefully selected bottom and constantly upgraded frying pans adopted the dotted line principle to channel the heat. The material of main body makes it difficult to lose heat in the outer layer, so as to achieve uniform heating. No matter how small the body is, there is no central hotspot PFOA FREE Unlike traditional non-stick pans, CS-KOCH adopts the five layers of pressing process, which avoids the glue used in the non-stick pan coating after heating precipitation of harmful substances. This is what CS-KOCH has always insisted on - healthy meals start with healthy cooking utensils. Real healthy cooking begins with both ingredients and utensils ERGONOMIC HANDLE Upgraded ergonomic handle for stability and duration. Wider and longer handle for more comfortable grip. At the same time, there are some changes in the angle of the handle to make cooking easier

CS-KOCH for your Art Cooking --- Enjoy Cooking with Your Beloved Ones Since 1829, CS-KOCH has been working to provide families with kitchen appliances that fit the trend. We now have an excellent and efficient product line to ensure that you can completely relax while cooking with our utensils: A variety of colors to match your kitchenDifferent interior to match your cooking habitAll sizes allow you to get everything you need at once

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Some of the best pots and pans I've ever purchased
reviews.reviewText: Anyone and everyone knowing me, know that if I leave a review like this, that there must be a reason. I have looked for a set of pots and pans similar to this brand for years. I didn't know whether or not these needed to be cured prior to use but I cured them anyway. I have not had a single problem with any one of them, in fact I use the believe it is either a 7-inch or a 10-in every single day with no issues. They clean very well and the no stick performance after 2 months has been without a single issue. So most definitely, I would recommend these items. There is one slight caveat, the handles do get hot so you will need something to hold on to the actual pots if it's left on the stove at a higher flame for a prolonged period, so just be cautious when dealing with heat/fire

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good pan

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Yes it works with induction stoves
reviews.reviewText: I picked up the pan & lid with a bunch of other ordered items at an Amz Locker a couple of days ago because I’m out of town. Usually I delay a review to use something like a pan & lid for several months of hard use first, but am putting this up because some of the one star ⭐️ reviews said it was NOT compatible with an induction stovetop. That is not the case for me because I specifically wanted that and it works fine on my NuWave induction burner/hob (*has adjustable wattage) that I brought along to test the pan out immediately in order to return if failed. Here are some photos of my tests: first I boiled 1 cup of cold water at 1300w on High & zippy quick the water came to a boil (if the pans aren’t compatible you get a beeping alarm & error code). Then I tested a new cup of cold water to a boil at 600w* on High, zip it was just as fast. Then I tried another cup of cold water on 600w on medium-high & the boil was almost as fast. Then I tried 600w on medium-low and got those little bubbles at the bottom rising to water surface as when simmering something in a pot on a stove. The next morning I used the pan to cook eggs and chicken sausage. This morning I made eggs with olive oil and stir fried some green beans with water/steam. There is no question this pan (I got the 8” diameter) works with my induction stove hob. And so far the glass lid fits properly in order to create steam to cook fresh string green beans.Rating: Giving the pan & lid a rating of 4 stars ⭐️ for now because 1.) most importantly, it works fine with my induction stove burner/hob. 2.) the lid fit properly & and the little vent properly lets steam escape to keep pressure from building up. 3.) Quality is fine. The pan’s non-stick surface has made for easy cleaning after cooking 3 or 4 meals on my trip. 4.) I would purchase this pan & lid again if the pricing remains competitive.Future Updates: I plan on revisiting my review with an update of 6 months of using it a lot more both at home and traveling.*600w is an important lower wattage setting if you are going to be using the induction stove while camping with an inverter on a portable power station.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holding Up Well After Two Years
reviews.reviewText: I use this pan primarily to make pancakes, french toast, eggs, and soft foods that I cook on med to low heat. I have also used it to make soft hamburger sliders and fish--anything I don't want to be seared or crispy on the outside. I use a plastic turner, gently clean it with a plastic scrub or soft spunge, and store it upside down so that other pans don't get stored on top of it. Haven't managed to scratch it yet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Every day use
reviews.reviewText: The lid on this size is well worth it. I fry three eggs, four could fit. Not for wide foods like steak though. I use bamboo for it, no scratches, cleans very easy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Purchased in June 2023. There is already the beginning of the nonstick chipping off the fry pan. While it is pinhole size, it still exists. ** The big, fry pan, food sticks like crazy!!** However I am now reluctant to use the fry pan.* That was my updated/ disappointed * 😞

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The non-stick factor is fine but not "great". The HANDLE gets HOT easily. And the RIVETS!! OMG!! WHY??? Any non-stick pan with rivets (THREE OF THEM HERE!) is a chore to clean. I, personally, haven't found a way to make scrambled eggs in this pan without getting cooked egg on those blinkety-blank RIVETS!!On the 'plus' side, the glass lid IS nice, although it would not be used much in my own cooking. I guess it's my fault, really.... I should have looked more closely at those d*mned rivets.
Great small frying pan, great value for money too
Distribution of heat is great love the fact the handles don't get warm touch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 29, 2021
reviews.reviewText: This item took a little while to arrive but it was well worth the wait. Whilst I agree I have not had it very long the results are pretty amazing. The conductivity is incredible so beware and use on a lower heat than usual. It cleans exceptionally well; no scrubbing required. I would recommend to anyone and it is well worth the money. I was well packaged and I would use this seller again. Thank you.
Purchased this as a gift , the party that received it is extremely pleased with it.I saw it and now I’m wanting one , if you are looking at this and wondering should I buy I’d say YES buy it .
